localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The simplest and most modern data-scraper as a service, as if postman was automated! Focus on developing data-dependant apps without worrying about the data gathering infrastructure. Made for aggregators, bots and data-driven applications.
nodes.title: Nozomi - Postman, but automated
nodes.author: Nicholas Chen

nodes.excerpt: Snap viewers out their doom scrolling with lively animated icons. With 3000+ easy-to-use graphics, you can build consistent apps, stores, and brands without the extra time or expense. - 20 popular styles - Tagged and searchable platform - Multiple formats
nodes.title: Animated Icons 3 - 3000+ engaging motion graphics by Icons8

nodes.excerpt: WeWeb is a no-code website builder that helps you build sites faster thanks to: - A professional editor built around collaboration - Data fetching from any backend/CMS (Airtable, Headless CMSes, REST API) - Importing custom components from GitHub (React / Vue)
nodes.title: WeWeb - No-code site builder that integrates with the tools you love

nodes.excerpt: Prefix helps your business get started with RPA without expensive implementation partners. Automate repetitive work on web and desktop apps that don't have APIâ€™s or clean software integrations, and save your team valuable time.
nodes.title: Prefix - Build custom computer automations anywhere
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Virtual workplace for remote & distributed teams â€” Team Presence, Fast Video Communication, Collaboration, Live Discussion & more.
nodes.title: WTEAM - All-in-one virtual office for remote & distributed teams
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

nodes.excerpt: Canâ€™t remember where you saved your Bank Account Number? Need quick access to your CV or the digital copy of your Passport? Thatâ€™s why we created Clipboard PRO: the easiest way to find, copy and paste all your information with a tap!
nodes.title: Clipboard PRO - Fast access to all your most used content
nodes.author: Giuseppe Travasoni

nodes.excerpt: Daily makes it easy to build real-time audio apps. We're a developer platform for audio and video APIs. Check out our Starter Kit with sample code for React, Android, ReactNative, and iOS. You can build audio fast, and scale with our secure infrastructure.
nodes.title: Daily - Build audio apps in a weekend
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: A web-based design tool to generate unique SVG design assets for websites, social media, blog posts, pitch decks, and more! Choose a visual from our growing list of generators, customize, randomize, and export it as an SVG or a PNG.
nodes.title: Haikei - Generate unique SVG design assets in just a few seconds
nodes.author: Cristina Poiata

nodes.excerpt: Emoji cloud is a CDN for vector emojies. Search copy and paste vector emojies to your projects in seconds
nodes.title: Emoji Cloud - A CDN for SVG emoji's
nodes.author: Alohe

nodes.excerpt: FlashDrive NoOps app platform handles everything for you while you focus on your product. Made by developers for developers, FlashDrive is compatible with Git deployment (Github, Gitlabs etc...), DockerHub etc... Free backups, SSL certs. and load balancers.
nodes.title: FlashDrive.io - noOps app platform for your apps
nodes.author: Alexandre Gonzales

nodes.excerpt: A simple service to get cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs. Just add a width and height to the end of the url.
nodes.title: Place Dog - Cute dogs as placeholders for your websites and designs
nodes.author: Josh Ghent

nodes.excerpt: A simple and elegant desktop application for managing your Laravel applications. - Execute Artisan commands easily in a nice interface. - Tinker with your project in a magical code editor.
nodes.title: Laravel Kit - Desktop Laravel admin panel app with no configuration needs
nodes.author: Tareque Md Hanif

nodes.excerpt: Coder moves software development to your cloud, centralizing an organization's development initiatives and unlocking substantial gains in both developer velocity and enterprise security.
nodes.title: Coder - The developer workspace platform
nodes.author: Nicolas Beauvais

nodes.excerpt: The project aims to provide tools to use during the development process. Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder texts, custom color dummy images, and videos of different sizes. Use generated content to test the layout until the real content arrives. Give it a try!
nodes.title: ipsm.io - Collection of productivity tools for developers & designers
nodes.author: Arsen Pyuskyulyan

nodes.excerpt: Blogstreak is the tool library for your blog. If you want nice clap and comments for your static blog then look no further blogstreak has the answer. Blogstreak using latest webcomponent technology so it's highly customisable.
nodes.title: Blogstreak - All things needed for running static blog
nodes.author: Raja Simon

nodes.excerpt: Meet Red: the only full-featured, professional Redis client written from the ground-up for the Mac! Red provides a powerful yet wonderfully simple interface to interact with Redis.
nodes.title: Red - A powerful and beautiful Redis client for Mac
nodes.author: Stephen C. Mitchell

nodes.excerpt: This free tool determines if your website follows the 7 key factors and if its complaint with Google's Core Web Vitals. Knowing where your website stands will help you prepare for the upcoming Google Page Experience Update in May!
nodes.title: Page Experience Checker by Cloudways - Test 7 factors of website compliance with core web vitals
nodes.author: Muhammad Saad Khan

nodes.excerpt: Fintoc enables developers to initiate bank transfers and pull transactional data from their users' bank accounts. Whether an app wants to automate bank reconciliation or improve its underwriting process, Fintoc is the way to go in Latin America.
nodes.title: Fintoc - An API to connect bank accounts with any app in LATAM
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Get a living snapshot of all your analytics. Just copy and paste a single line of code to your Website or App and, within minutes, all your events will be monitored and automatically added to your tracking plan.
nodes.title: Trackingplan - Monitor your analytics without the hassle
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Comprehensive design system featuring modular components to help build consistent, high-quality and performant web apps.
nodes.title: Nile Dashboard - Extensive design system and modular components for web apps
nodes.author: Mohamed Elgendy

nodes.excerpt: Serverless Invoices is a free tool for invoice generating and management - no signup needed. Truly serverless, your data is safe with you in your browser. Export/import your invoices. It's open source, easy to modify, easy to deploy.
nodes.title: Serverless Invoices - Free, serverless invoice generator - open sourced
nodes.author: Marek

nodes.excerpt: Webiny is an open-source framework that helps developers architect, build and deploy applications on top of the serverless infrastructure. Webiny also comes with a serverless CMS that runs on top of AWS Lambda, DynamoDB, and S3.
nodes.title: Webiny 5.0 - Build serverless applications and websites in minutes
nodes.author: Kat Manalac

nodes.excerpt: Use our collaborative editor to create motion graphics that respond to different states and user inputs. Then load your animations into apps, games, and websites with our open-source runtimes.
nodes.title: Rive - Create and ship interactive animations to any platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Formst is a JavaScript library for structuring and validating forms in React. It is based on MobX-State-Tree which makes it simple and performant and it is built on the principles of "UI as an afterthought".
nodes.title: Formst - Model-driven form library for React
nodes.author: Gaurav Guha
